hero.title: Spotter AI
hero.subtitle: Track your progress and bring fitness to the next level.

sections.title: Nutrition
sections.description: {{Optimize your nutrition by logging your meals in seconds. Get instant insights: a breakdown of calories, protein, carbs, and fats.}} Actionable data, instant readings, and an experience so simple it helps you stay on track even on your most chaotic days.

sections.title: Workout
sections.description: Train with purpose and track real progress. {{Log your sessions by sets, reps, and weight,}} while visualizing side-by-side comparisons with your previous workouts.

sections.title: Streaks
sections.description: Consistency is key, and no one wants to fall off their peak. {{Make consistency visible, measurable, and motivating with Streaks.}} Complete weekly challenges, earn XP, and compete in different leagues so that hitting your next workout becomes second nature.

sections.title: Social
sections.description: {{Spotter is more than just a fitness app: it's a social network for progressing together.}} Share your meals and routines to create a feed that pushes you forward when motivation fades. Follow your friends and share your journey. Consistency is easier when you're part of a community.

thankYou.title: Successful registration!
thankYou.subtitle: You're now part of the Spotter community. Go back to the app and sign in to {{transform your fitness journey.}}
